# stringValue

**Instance Property**

The string representation of the badge when it displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var stringValue: String? { get }
```

## Accessing menu item badge attributes

- **itemCount**: The number of items the badge displays.
- **type**: The type of items the badge displays.

items.description: The number of items the badge displays.
items.name: itemCount

items.description: The type of items the badge displays.
items.name: type
